function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c =="x" then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line) elseif c == "o" then oxyd( i-1, line) elseif c == "!" then fill_floor("fl-water", i-1,line, 1,1) elseif c=="+" then set_stone( "st-wood", i-1, line) elseif c=="g" then draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1) elseif c=="l" then oneway(i-1,line, enigma.WEST) elseif c=="u" then oneway(i-1,line, enigma.NORTH) elseif c=="r" then oneway(i-1,line, enigma.EAST) elseif c=="d" then oneway(i-1,line, enigma.SOUTH) elseif c=="z" then if enigma.CreatingPreview then set_actor("ac-blackball", 0.5, 13.5 , {player=0}) else set_actor("ac-blackball", i-.5,line+.5, {player=0}) end set_item("it-yinyang", i-1,line) elseif c=="y" then set_actor("ac-whiteball", i-.5, line+.5, {player=1}) set_item("it-yinyang", i-1,line) elseif c=="g" then draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1) elseif c=="G" then draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1) set_item("it-seed", i-1, line) elseif c=="#" then yy1( "black", i-1, line) elseif c=="w" then yy1( "white", i-1, line) elseif c=="S" then set_stone("st-switch", i-1,line, {action="openclose",target="door1"}) elseif c=="s" then doorh( i-1,line, {name="door1"}) end end end
function yy1( color, x, y) stone = format( "st-%s4", color) set_stone( stone, x, y) end
